summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Criminal Code; amending, adding and repealing various sections and subsections in chapters 12A.02, 12A.04, 12A.06, 12A.08, 12A.16, 12A.18, 12A.24, 15.48, 16.20, 18.12 and 21.36 of the Seattle Municipal Code to conform with changes in State Law.
committee: Public Safety, Human Services and Education
